text: Epitácio Cafeteira Afonso Pereira (June 27, 1924 – May 13, 2018) was a Brazilian politician. He was federal deputy (1975–1987), governor of Maranhão (1987–1990) and senator (1991–1999, 2007–2015). Cafeteira was born in João Pessoa, Paraíba. Cafeteira died on May 13, 2018 of pneumonia in Maranhão at the age of 93. ==References== Category:1924 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Politicians from Maranhão
title: Epitácio Cafeteira
